Darren worked at Charles Schwab before you started

DCT Industrial is looking for a Construction Manager to be based in our Newport Beach, CA office and will be responsible for managing comprehensive scopes of work, directing vendors, analyzing proposals, and completing TI and capital improvement projects.
Assistant Vice President, Talent Acquisition and Development

Black Creek Capital is an innovative, hands-on real estate company with diverse product offerings, multi-channel distribution and a track record of creating value and producing long-term results for investors.  We're real estate experts who develop, acquire, operate, finance and sell commercial and residential real estate in the United States and Mexico through platform companies.
Assistant Vice President, Talent Acquisition and Development

DCT Industrial (NYSE:DCT) is a proven leader in industrial real estate, offering best-in-class ownership, acquisition, development, leasing and management. Everything DCT does is driven by a genuine desire to exceed expectations. We constantly strive to be more creative, more engaged, and more responsive than any of our competitors—delivering value and doing the right thing, every step of the way.
Talent Acquisition / Recruitment Program Manager - College, Veteran/Military, Employee Referrals

Responsible for managing strategic recruitment and human resources projects and programs designed to more effectively source, select and retain top talent•	Provide leadership of cross-functional teams, manage processes and see projects through to completion•	Ensure the overall success of programs including Employee Referrals, College Recruiting, Internship Programs, Social Media, Internal Mobility and Military Recruiting.  Reengineer existing procedures to streamline processes and ensure a better experience for the end user•	Manage relationships, influence and persuade at all levels of the organization as well as with external partners•	Conduct needs analysis and gather requirements to make recommendations of future projects and initiatives

Regional HR Manager and leader of strategic initiatives operating in a five state region with approx 250 employees.•	Coach and guide managers at all levels of the organization regarding leadership development, performance management, disciplinary action, staffing and recruitment and succession planning strategies•	Implemented a progressive disciplinary action process and achieved fairness in dealing with employee relations issues by effectively collaborating with and advising Sr. Management•	Conduct investigations; interview witnesses, determine validity of the accusations, propose appropriate action and draft witness and summary statements•	Co-authored skill guides and conducted road shows to roll-out and train Field Managers•	Create and provide Sr. Management dashboards to evaluate the success of HR programs and drive future initiatives•	Present employee retention and turnover reduction strategies at annual meetings•	Deliver company responses to EEOC, ADA, HIPAA, DOL, and unemployment hearings •	Proposed 9-block performance management model to identify top performers and prepare them to be successors for key roles within the company as well as identifying underperformers that should be exited from the business

Responsible for implementing a full-cycle recruiting strategy and diversity initiative for Nelnet and its subsidiaries.•	Developed a comprehensive recruitment strategy to source and recruit qualified IT and Operations candidates to be placed within Nelnet and its family of companies: CUnet, Petersons, Sparkroom, Nelnet Business Solutions, and FACTS•	Utilized job boards (traditional and niche), social networking, recruiting agencies, corporate website, referrals, and colleges/universities to identify a diverse pool of qualified candidates •	Ensured that company, state, and federal policies/laws are followed in recruitment and placement procedures•	Provided a detailed analysis of the Predictive Index assessment comparing a candidates behavioral tendencies to those of the position•	Partnered with Sr.  Leadership and HR Managers to identify future needs of the business and build a pool of viable, passive candidates•	Experienced within the Interactive Advertising, Online Marketing and E-commerce industries•	Worked with candidates and attorneys to finalize and apply for H1-B Visas

October 18, 2012, Alan worked with Darren in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Darren as my Recruiter to fill numerous roles within my team over a period of about 2 years. He was always proactive in determining new ways to identify qualified candidates and ensuring that his screening process was optimized to save my time by weeding out undesirable candidates. Darren always treated my requests with great urgency and made me feel like I was the only hiring manager he was working with. He rose to the difficult challenge of recruiting for an unfamiliar location and he was open to trying new methods when necessary to achieve the best results. I would be happy to work with Darren again and I am sure that he would be a great addition to any team.

Results-Oriented CHRO Helping High Growth Companies Build, Manage and Scale
November 12, 2012, Darren reported directly to Lori

Looking back at my career, there are very few people that I consider to be a mentor - and Lori is 1 of those people. She taught me lessons that have stuck with me not only in business but also in my personal life - hold yourself to a higher ethical level, treat people with the respect you would expect them to treat you with, be a team player, do your homework and know the facts before acting; and most importantly - honesty is the best practice. In addition to the outstanding person Lori is, she's also 1 of the most intelligent, knowledgeable, grounded, reasonable and logical professionals I've ever worked for. I am forever grateful to have Lori in my corner and I take comfort knowing she's had a hand in my past and future.

October 16, 2012, Darren worked with Alan in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Alan building 2 distinctly different teams – 1 utilizing newer technologies and the other maintaining outdated/retiring technologies.  Alan is a true professional who was easily able to switch gears and manage both teams effectively by staying abreast and embracing the new while also remembering and maintaining the merits of the old.  From a recruiting perspective – Alan is as good as it gets.  He’s an active and engaged hiring manager who offered timely feedback and remained patient as we identified highly specialized candidates for hard to fill positions.  I would welcome the opportunity to work with Alan again and have every confidence he’ll be a successful hire on his next endeavor.

summary: I am the Assistant Vice President of Talent Acquisition and Development responsible for the design, development, and oversight of Talent Acquisition activities for every company sponsored by Black Creek Group and Dividend Capital as well as DCT Industrial Trust.  I am focused on attracting talented individuals to our organizations and creating a world-class candidate experience.
